name: Get OFF My Lawn!!
description:
Get Off My Lawn! is a simple click'em-up where you use the anger of Grumpy Gramps to keep tresspassers off his lawn.

Click on the things. If they make it all the way across the lawn, the precedence will be set, and the game is over.

If download appears unavailable, download through the Itch App

July 25th, 2016:

Alpha Build:

- The basic gameplay loop is there!

- Four things to click!

> children

> bunnies

> squirrels

> fat guys

- A game over screen!

- Music

- A secret.

- A persistent high score list and display (custom)

-Pause Screen

-Text that scales!

-Authentic old man yelling!
